titleStmt.title: The frame of the government of the province of Pennsylvania in America
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and Sold by Andrew Soule at the Crooked- Billet in Holloway Lane in Shoreditch,

notesStmt.note: The preface and the Frame of the government are signed: William Penn.
Imperfect: tightly bound and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England)

place.placeName: the Crooked- Billet in Holloway Lane in Shoreditch
